Package project4

Class Donut

java.lang.Object
project4.MenuItem
project4.Donut
public class Donut
extends MenuItem
This class extends the MenuItem class and contains common attributes and operations specific to an instance of a donut
Author:
David Ha, Andrew McAvoy
